thread.title: Germany's Home24 plans IPO as seeks to rival IKEA in online furniture sales

title: Germany's Home24 plans IPO as seeks to rival IKEA in online furniture sales
text:
May 18, 2018 / 6:16 AM / Updated 4 minutes ago Germany's Home24 plans IPO as seeks to rival IKEA in online furniture sales Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
FRANKFURT (Reuters) - German online furniture retailer Home24, which wants to challenge IKEAâ€™s dominance of the European furniture market, said on Friday that it was planning a stock market listing, hoping to raise up to 200 million euros (175 million pounds).
Launched in 2009 in Berlin, the loss-making firm delivers furniture in seven European markets, plus Brazil. Ecommerce investor Rocket Internet holds a 43 percent stake. Reporting by Emma Thomasson; editing by Tom Sims
